ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of absence to the Hon. Georgette Sheridan
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. GEORGETTE SHERIDAN, a judge of the Tax Court of Canada, from November 18, 2012 to February 17, 2013, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
